Package com.shashi.service

Interface CartService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CartServiceImpl
public interface CartService
Service interface for managing shopping cart operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    addProductToCart(String userId, String prodId, int prodQty)
    Adds a product to the user's cart.
    List<CartBean>
    getAllCartItems(String userId)
    Retrieves all items currently in a user's cart.
    int
    getCartCount(String userId)
    Gets the total count of items (sum of quantities) in a user's cart.
    int
    getCartItemCount(String userId, String itemId)
    Gets the quantity of a specific item in a user's cart.
    boolean
    removeAProduct(String userId, String prodId)
    Removes a product entirely from the user's cart, regardless of quantity.
    String
    removeProductFromCart(String userId, String prodId)
    Removes one unit of a product from the user's cart.
    String
    updateProductToCart(String userId, String prodId, int prodQty)
    Updates the quantity of a product in the user's cart, or adds it if it doesn't exist.

  • Method Details

    • addProductToCart

      String addProductToCart(String userId, String prodId, int prodQty)
      Adds a product to the user's cart.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      prodId - The ID of the product.
      prodQty - The quantity of the product to add.
      Returns:
      A status message indicating success or failure.

    • updateProductToCart

      String updateProductToCart(String userId, String prodId, int prodQty)
      Updates the quantity of a product in the user's cart, or adds it if it doesn't exist.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      prodId - The ID of the product.
      prodQty - The new quantity of the product in the cart.
      Returns:
      A status message indicating success or failure.

    • getAllCartItems

      List<CartBean> getAllCartItems(String userId)
      Retrieves all items currently in a user's cart.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      A list of CartBean objects representing the cart items.

    • getCartCount

      int getCartCount(String userId)
      Gets the total count of items (sum of quantities) in a user's cart.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      The total count of items in the cart.

    • getCartItemCount

      int getCartItemCount(String userId, String itemId)
      Gets the quantity of a specific item in a user's cart.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      itemId - The ID of the item (product).
      Returns:
      The quantity of the specified item in the cart.

    • removeProductFromCart

      String removeProductFromCart(String userId, String prodId)
      Removes one unit of a product from the user's cart. If quantity becomes zero, the product is removed.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      prodId - The ID of the product to remove.
      Returns:
      A status message indicating success or failure.

    • removeAProduct

      boolean removeAProduct(String userId, String prodId)
      Removes a product entirely from the user's cart, regardless of quantity.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      prodId - The ID of the product to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the product was successfully removed, false otherwise.
